SELECT MCC_L_CODE, MCC_L_NAME FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_L_CODE = '500' GROUP BY MCC_L_CODE, MCC_L_NAME
HAVING MCC_L_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MCC_L_CODE

SELECT MCC_M_CODE, MCC_M_NAME FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_M_CODE != ' ' AND MCC_M_CODE = '501'
AND MCC_M_CODE = '501'
GROUP BY MCC_M_CODE, MCC_M_NAME
HAVING MCC_M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MCC_M_CODE

SELECT MCC_L_CODE, MCC_L_NAME, MCC_M_CODE, MCC_M_NAME, MCC_S_CODE, MCC_S_NAME, MCC_SORT_ORDER, MCC_COM_N1, MCC_COM_N2 FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_S_CODE != ' ' AND MCC_L_CODE = '500'
AND MCC_M_CODE = '501' /**P*/
AND MCC_S_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MCC_S_CODE
